snippet: A federal complaint in Brooklyn says Mohanad Mahmoud Al Farekh left Canada for Pakistan with a classmate, who provided weapons training to would-be terrorists.
abstract: Mohanad Mahmoud Al Farekh, Texas-born man who flew to Pakistan to join Al Qaeda, is returned to United States and arraigned in Brooklyn on charges of providing material aid to terrorists.
lead_paragraph: A federal complaint in Brooklyn says Mohanad Mahmoud Al Farekh left Canada for Pakistan with a classmate, who provided weapons training to would-be terrorists.

headline.main: Texas-Born Man, Flown Back From Pakistan, Is Held on Terror Charge
headline.print_headline: Flown Back From Pakistan, Man Is Held on Terror Charge
